mapper.insert: insert into teacheringWork_graduationDesignGuide (id, classTeacher, status, name, character, level, winnersNumber, note, year, semester) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{classTeacher,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{character,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{level,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{winnersNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{note,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{year,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{semester,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.select: select id, classTeacher, status, name, character, level, winnersNumber, note, year, semester from teacheringWork_graduationDesignGuide where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
